snippet: One benefit of an attack by a group like Anonymous: it can gird a company against more serious online espionage.
abstract: Experts at the RSA computer security conference in San Francisco say that hackers operating under the banner Anonymous, in their attacks on private companies over the past two years, have raised the alarm about the unguarded state of corporate computer systems; say a company that is a target of Anonymous, which has not done irreparable damage, may also be the target of a far more potent adversary.

byline.original: By SOMINI SENGUPTA and NICOLE PERLROTH

lead_paragraph: One benefit of an attack by a group like Anonymous: it can gird a company against more serious online espionage.
